H0.text: What colour is the cross on the national flag of Switzerland. Red

H1.text: What colour is the cross on the national flag of Switzerland. Blue

H2.text: What colour is the cross on the national flag of Switzerland. Yellow

H3.text: What colour is the cross on the national flag of Switzerland. White

A4.text: The national flag of Switzerland displays a white Greek cross in the center of a square red field.

A5.text: The Swiss cross is defined as a white, upright, free-standing cross depicted against a red background.
